reviews.text: Great and comfortable stay. Our room was super cute. And I loved peeping over the cutest smurf that was spotted right outside our window. The hotel location is fantastic and you can stroll around a lot of beautiful places which are hardly situated at a short distance. Plus the taxis are right outside the hotel so you can travel to distant places too, you want to visit. Thanks to all the courteous staff's

Excellent location close to central station, close to the hustle and bustle of the grand place.
Located on a busy corner.
Hotel had a constant flow of people checking in and out, caters for families.
Sofa bed in superior double was suitable for a teenager.
Hotel was very comfortable and no noise heard what so ever.
High standards of cleanliness throughout the hotel.
Staff are so friendly, from housekeeping to the front desk, great to see relaxed staff who worked together.

Great stay at Novotel Brussels! The rooms were spacious, modern, and spotless. The staff was incredibly friendly and accommodating. Perfect location, just a short walk to Grand Place and other attractions. Breakfast was delicious with plenty of variety.

Very good location near the Brussels Central Train Station and Grand Place. The room was made up daily and they were nice to extend our room checkout to beyond 11am as we were having some delays getting our rental car in the morning. Overall a nice stay

We had a very good stay at the hotel.
The staff was very nice and supportive.
Breakfast was also good.
Room cleanliness and the beds are excellent.
Overall experience was really good.
